price: Nokorε sε, kanee no yesu frεε no. Nokorε sε Ͻyε Otumfoͻ a Ɔwͻ ayεmyε, Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene no.
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nadʿūhu innahu huwa al-baru al-raḥīmu
